resources.string: Transaction history, transfers, and payments always at hand
YooMoney is one of the biggest payment services in Russia. You can pay any bills, fines, or loans on our website or in the app.

"Service for online and offline payments. It helps to pay for products and services, transfer and receive money. In YooMoney, you can create an electronic wallet and issue a virtual bank card quickly and for free."
"You can't sign in with no access to this information: we'll send you back to the start"
Если ничего не происходит, попробуйте ещё
You might need your phone and access to your current email address
"Now you can use it for signing in to your account and access recovery. Receipts and important notifications about your account will be sent to this email address."

"Now you can use it for signing in to your account and access recovery.
Receipts and important notifications about your account as well as news and promotions will be sent to this email address."

"Use it for signing in to your account and access recovery.
Notifications (if enabled) and receipts will be sent to the new email address."
"After changing your password, you'll need to sign in to your account again: on all devices"
Now you need to sign in to your account again, using the new password this time
"First, we'll send a text message containing a code to the current number. You'll need to enter it at the next step"
You can use it to sign in to your account. Text message codes for confirming transactions will also be sent to this phone number.
"Something's wrong. Please come back a bit later."
Try signing in differently: using phone number or email address
This address is already taken, try a different one
Get an email containing the code
Now, the code from the email
Если вы не можете получить письмо, напишите нам — разберёмся вместе.

"— There's a typo in the address (check every character) — The email got sorted into the spam folder If there's nothing in the spam folder, the email address is entered correctly, and you can't receive new emails either, contact us."
Get an email containing the code
"I'd like to receive news about the service, discounts, and surveys: not more than once a week"
"Use a different email address. You've deleted a wallet using this address once, and you can't use it again"
Code expired: you need to get a new one
Incorrect code. Please check and try again
Incorrect again. One last attempt left
Incorrect code again. Out of attempts
You have no web browser apps
You have no apps for calls
You have no apps for sending emails
"It might've been a one-time technical error"
"It doesn't change any limits, commission rates, or other terms of use of the wallet in any way: learn more"

"You used to sign in to your wallet using your Yandex username and password, now you need a YooMoney account instead.
Let us help you get it: — sign in using your Yandex username and password, — allow YooMoney to access your name and email address, — create a new password.
You'll get a YooMoney account with the same wallet that you've had in it. Email address and password are used for signing in, and text message codes are used for confirming actions."
Something is wrong. Please double check the data you entered
The YooMoney app wants to open the Sberbank app
"If you signed up before October 13, you need to switch to YooMoney "
Enter your mobile phone number or email address

"Здравствуйте! Случилось что-то невнятное, и мы куда-то переносим ваш кошелёк.
Есть подозрение, что в конечном итоге для вас ничего не поменяется (хотя кто знает).
Введите свой пароль, подтвердите мобильный телефон, и дальше можно пользоваться кошельком как обычно. Наверное."
You need to download the YooMoney app to transfer your account
Looks like the connection is lost. Please check
Some symbol is not suitable. Enter another name
"Try signing in differently: using phone number or email address"
"To do it, sign in to your wallet or create a new one. Please note: %s can be linked only to one wallet."
You can only use Latin letters and special characters
"Passwords don't match. Check and try again"
Latin letters: upper and lower case
"Incorrect. Check the password and the account that you're trying to sign in to"
"Don't share it with anyone: only fraudsters ask for passwords and text message codes"
"We'll tell you how to recover your password"
I have no access to the phone number
Now you can sign in to your account using the new password
I have no access to my phone number

"— It's just being delayed for a couple of minutes, it happens sometimes — Your mobile carrier is having technical difficulties If everything's alright on the mobile carrier's side but you can't receive the text message even on the third attempt, contact us."
"Why can't I receive the text message?"
This phone number is linked to a different account. Enter your email address or select a different phone number.
New phone number is the same as the current one
There are multiple phone numbers linked to this account: select which one to keep for text message codes and access recovery.
This phone number is used for 10 different accounts: enter a different number
It was probably a technical error: try again or use a different sign-in method: for example, using your phone number or email address.
Refresh the QR code on the sign-in page and scan it again
Everything was canceled, but you can try again
The pause is getting too long
Trying to sign in to YooMoney on PC?
"You signed in to your account on the YooMoney website"
By clicking this button, I confirm that I’m aware of all the legal terms and conditions of the service and I accept them

By clicking this button, I confirm that I’m aware of all the legal terms and conditions of the service and I accept them as well as the fact that if I don’t enable notifications to my email address or phone number, my transaction history in the YooMoney app or on the website will be the only available source of information
"Your registration has been going on for too long. Let's try again"
"You've been trying to sign in for over an hour. Let's try again"
"This pause has been going on for too long: let's try again"
Done! Now you can sign in via Sber ID (or using your phone number and email address as usual).
There are multiple email addresses linked to the %s account: select which one to keep for signing in and access recovery.
A different wallet is already linked to this Sber ID
"It doesn't change any limits, commission rates, or other terms of use of the wallet in any way: learn more"

"Your wallet is now in YooMoney, separate from your Yandex account.
— What remains as it was before: your wallet number, settings configuration, and terms of use.
— What's changed: you'll use your email address or phone number instead of your username (like in Yandex). You can also update your password.
— What you need to do now: sign in to your Yandex account, under which you have your wallet."
"If you have no access to this email address, contact us: we'll solve the problem together."
"If you have no access to this phone number, contact us: we'll solve the problem together."
Too many attempts to get the code: pause required
"You'll always need your email address, phone number, and password for signing in."
Unlink your wallet from Sber ID?
"Looks like you've already tried to get or enter the code: now a pause is required."
"That's great news: now you can just sign in to your account. Use the email address you entered during the transition. "
Try signing in using a different email address or create a new account.

"You used to sign in to your wallet using your Yandex username and password, now you need a YooMoney account instead. Let us help you get it: — sign in using your Yandex username and password, — allow YooMoney to access your name and email address, — create a new password. You'll get a YooMoney account with the same wallet that you've had in it. Email address and password are used for signing in, and text message codes are used for confirming actions. "
"%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device."
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device."
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
"Looks like this app doesn't have location services configured. Please see OneSignal docs for more information."
Switch to clock mode for the time input.
Switch to text input mode for the time input.
Tap to switch to selecting a day
Tap to switch to selecting a year
You have previously denied %s. Please go to settings to enable.
"Next time, you won't have to sign in to your YooMoney account, which will make payments faster"

"If you allowed it, your bank card details will be saved for this store and its partners: card number, cardholder's name, and expiration date (everything except the CVC). Next time, you won't need to enter them for payments in this store.
Besides that, we'll link the card (including if it's been used via Google Pay) to the store. After that, the store will be able to send requests for debiting money automatically: then the payment is made without an additional confirmation from you.
Autopayments will continue even after you reissue the card, even if your bank can update the data automatically. You can cancel them and unlink the card at any moment via store's support service."
Allow autopayments and save payment details
Allowing autopayments and saving payment details
"Connection error. Try again once you're online"
"You'll be redirected into the Google Pay app: confirm the payment"

"To do that, go to the wallet settings on the YooMoney website or in the app. In the app: tap on your profile picture, select \"Bank cards\", swipe the one you need to the left, and tap \"Remove\". On the website: go to the wallet settings, open the \"Linked cards\" tab, find the one you need, and click \"Unlink\"."
How to unlink a card from the wallet

"If you allow autopayments, we'll link the bank card (including if it's been used via Google Pay) to the store. After that, the store will be able to send requests for debiting money automatically, then the payment is made without an additional confirmation from you.
Autopayments will continue even after you reissue the card, even if your bank can update the data automatically. You can cancel them and unlink the card at any moment via store's support service."
You can only unlink this card in the wallet settings
"Autopayments will continue after you remove the card. To cancel autopayments, contact store's support service"
Your phone number in SberBank Online
the terms and conditions of the service
Are you sure you want to sign out of account %1$s?
If you signed up before October 21, you need to switch to YooMoney
No attempts left, you need to get a new code
Invalid code. Double-check and try again
Invalid code. Double-check and try again

"It can happen when you pay on an online platform where it's possible to buy from multiple sellers at once (for example, on marketplaces). You can find the list of recipients on the platform where you're making the payment."
Why the payment has multiple recipients

"If you allowed it, your bank card details will be saved for this store and its partners: card number, cardholder's name, and expiration date (everything except the CVC). Next time, you won't need to enter them for payments in this store.
You can delete the bank card details during the payment process (tap on the three dots next to the card and select \"Remove the card\") or by contacting the support service."
"Autopayments will continue even after you reissue the card, even if your bank can update the data automatically. You can cancel them and unlink the card at any moment via store's support service."

"If you allow autopayments, we'll link the card (including if it's been used via Google Pay) to the store. After that, the store will be able to send requests for debiting money automatically, then the payment is made without an additional confirmation from you. "

to debit money without your participation

save your bank card details to be able to debit money without your participation

will save your bank card details

": next time you won't need to enter them"

"It means that you're allowing YooMoney to debit money from the wallet upon store's request without an additional confirmation from you. You can disable these autopayments at any moment in the wallet settings (on the YooMoney website)."
Permission to debit money without your participation
By making this payment, you allow saving this wallet and
to debit money without your participation
Next, the SberBank Online application will be opened: confirm the payment
Phone number for payment confirmation via SberBank Online
